title: contemporary font with wedge and block serifs
content:
I am trying to find a font with wedge serifs and block serifs. I thought it was one of the Featured Typefaces for this site, but I couln't find it in the archive list. Its been a while since I've sen it though.

Any ideas?
author: popluhv

comments.content:
Hi Nathan,

could it be [Rocky](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013201329/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Rocky)?  
F
That not it. the font I'm thinking of had a wedge serif on one side of s leg (I think the left side) and a slab on the other.

[url=http://www.last.fm/user/popluhv/?chartstyle=contrastorange] [img]http://imagegen.last.fm/contrastorange/recenttracks/1/popluhv.gif[/img] [/url]

What I'm looking for was a mono-weight, on the other hand, Ommegaand is close; possibly better than what I was thinking of.
